channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New details emerge about Japan's notorious WWII germ warfare program
item.description: The release of WWII-era military documents this year has given a boost to researchers digging into Japan's germ warfare program. Japan's government ha...

item.title: Mayors of Democratic cities respond to Trump's threats they could be next after D.C.

item.title: Hundreds of retired air force officers protest Israel's war in Gaza
item.description: Hundreds of former air force reservists and pilots join a chorus of defense establishment figures calling for an immediate end to the war in Gaza.

item.title: Trump is tightening the screws on corporate America — and CEOs are staying mum
item.description: Critics warn that Trump's demands for business leaders to step down, and for the government to take a cut of sales, threaten American-style capitalism...

item.title: Israeli settlement plans will 'bury' idea of Palestinian state, minister says
item.description: Far-right Israeli minister Bezalel Smotrich announced approval for 3,401 new homes in the controversial E1 area project in the occupied West Bank.

item.title: EU sending wildfire help to Spain as death toll rises
item.description: Spain has activated an EU disaster assistance mechanism for fires for the first time ever.

item.title: Dozens of migrants killed after boats capsize off Italian coast
item.description: More than 700 have died crossing the central Mediterranean in 2025, according to the UN reugee agency.

item.title: Putin must 'prove he is serious about peace,' says Starmer
item.description: Sir Keir Starmer staged a show of unity with the Ukrainian president ahead of Friday's summit between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin.

item.title: MTV announces 2025 Video Music Award nominees. See the full list.
item.description: Lady Gaga tops the list of nominees for the 2025 Video Music Awards. Here are all the VMA nominations, and how you can vote for your favorite artists.

item.title: Consumers are skipping their usual fast-food breakfasts. Here's why.
item.description: Americans are reining in their spending at fast-food restaurants as they continue to face economic uncertainty.

item.title: What do Putin and Trump each want from summit in Alaska?
item.description: The Russian leader senses a chance for more international recognition, while his American counterpart hopes to play peacemaker.
